title: card.status Response Application Programming Interface (API) Schema

apiVersion.description: Semantic version of the Notecard API

usb.description: Is the Notecard is being powered by USB

storage.description: The percentage of storage in use on the Notecard

time.description: The UNIX Epoch Time of approximately when the Notecard was first powered up

connected.description: Whether the Notecard is connected to the Notehub

cell.description: Whether the Notecard has a cellular connection

sync.description: Whether the Notecard is currently syncing with the Notehub

inbound.description: Number of inbound Notes waiting to be retrieved by the host

outbound.description: Number of outbound Notes waiting to be synced to the Notehub
